allow:
Bash(echo "

=================================================================
GITHUB SECRETS SETUP - Action Required
=================================================================

The GitHub Action failed because secrets are not configured yet.

Please follow these steps:

STEP 1: Get Firebase Service Account
------------------------------------
1. Go to: https://console.firebase.google.com/project/superpets-ee0ab/settings/serviceaccounts/adminsdk

2. Click ''Generate new private key''

3. Download the JSON file

4. Open it and COPY the entire JSON content


STEP 2: Add GitHub Secrets
------------------------------------
1. Go to: https://github.com/alicankorkmaz-sudo/superpets/settings/secrets/actions

2. Click ''New repository secret''

3. Add Secret #1:
   Name: FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
   Value: [Paste the entire JSON from Step 1]
   
4. Add Secret #2:
   Name: VITE_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY
   Value: pk_test_51SEGggRVlNnZcpuImz9GGK0ItrObzZlpPG1zcZpaUghrH1WZdZ6FN0zUooV1LarZetr4d3eWs1QqJ7lCtHHXphCb00TfK18rVV


STEP 3: Re-run the Failed Workflow
------------------------------------
After adding secrets:
1. Go to: https://github.com/alicankorkmaz-sudo/superpets/actions
2. Click on the failed workflow run
3. Click ''Re-run all jobs''

=================================================================

Detailed instructions: See GITHUB_ACTIONS_SETUP.md

")
